name: Cucumber
description: The cucumber is a widely cultivated creeping vine that bears cylindrical fruits, which are used as vegetables in cooking. It is known for its high water content and refreshing taste, making it a popular choice in salads and pickling.

growth_characteristics.height: 0.5 to 2 meters (as a vine, or when trellised)

environmental_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained, fertile soil rich in organic matter
environmental_requirements.watering_frequency: Frequent watering, keeping soil consistently moist
